title: Reallocate Crew Due to Material Delay
description: The delivery of structural steel is delayed by a week. The project manager must reallocate the steel erection crew to another task.

tasks.description: Identify that the 'Steel Erection Crew' is scheduled for a task that is now blocked.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the crew's current task is blocked by the material delay.

tasks.description: Find an available, non-dependent task that the crew can perform, such as 'Site Safety Improvements'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a suitable task that can be started immediately.

tasks.description: Reassign the 'Steel Erection Crew' to the 'Site Safety Improvements' task for the next 5 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew's schedule is updated in the project plan.
